games.title: Draw or Delete LoveStory
games.description: Dive into the engaging realm of Draw or Delete LoveStory, a fascinating puzzle game where you play a detective revealing a couple's secrets. Manipulate scenes by drawing or deleting elements on your phone or computer. Enjoy this thrilling adventure filled with surprises, all at no cost online.
games.howToPlayText: Look at the picture, read the task, draw or erase the element and complete the task! It's simple and very fun!

games.title: Color Pixels - Coloring by Numbers
games.description: Immerse yourself in a delightful realm of art and tranquility with Color Pixels - Coloring by Numbers. Easily turn black-and-white images into colorful creations by following the numbered instructions. This free online game offers a fun way to unwind, whether on a phone or computer, allowing everyone to achieve beautiful results.
games.howToPlayText:
Your task is to transform black-and-white images into vibrant works of art by coloring them by numbers. You can play on both computers and touch devices like phones and tablets.

Controls:
1. Select a category from the gallery, then choose a picture to get started.
2. Zoom in or out: Use the slider at the top of the screen, pinch gestures, or your mouse wheel to focus on details.
3. Pick a color: Choose the desired color from the palette at the bottom of the screen.
4. Color by numbers: Find the corresponding areas and bring the picture to life with color.
5. Use boosters: Speed up the coloring process with special tools and achieve the best results.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/color-pixels-coloring-by-numbers?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Lady Rescue
games.description:
Welcome to Lady Rescue!, the perfect game for those who love drawing and solving puzzles!
Join our brave girl, Lady, on an exciting journey filled with challenging puzzles, honey bees, and lots of surprises. 
In this game, you need to help Lady escape from dangerous things like bees, sharks, and crocodiles by drawing lines. You have to think and act fast to keep her safe. 
It's not just fun, it's also a brain teaser that makes you think. You will find yourself in different situations where you need to use your smartness to draw a line that will save Lady.
games.howToPlayText:
- Touch and drag your finger to draw a line.
- Protect Lady within 5 seconds.
- Help her escape and move to the next level.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/lady-rescue?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Draw One Line Bridge Puzzle
games.description: Play Draw One Line Bridge Puzzle, a free brain-teasing game where you build bridges to guide vehicles to safety. Solve challenging puzzles, enjoy ragdoll physics, addictive gameplay, and offline fun. Perfect for car and puzzle lovers—test your skills today!
games.howToPlayText:
How to play
Draw a single line to complete each level.
Avoid other cars, cutters, and obstacles.
Try not to get stuck on any level.
Be careful not to damage the car, or you'll fail.

games.title: Happy Coloring Book
games.description: Color your world with our interactive web coloring book game! Choose from a variety of fun drawings to bring your imagination to life.
games.howToPlayText: Select a drawing from our coloring book and use the virtual crayons to color it in. Experiment with different colors and techniques to create your masterpiece. Once you're done, save and share your creation with friends!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/happy-coloring-book-1c70-1?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Arkanoid For Painters
games.description: Arkanoid For Painters is a thrilling online game where players create barriers to control a ball, clearing blocks and foes. It blends classic gameplay with artistic elements, catering to creative strategists. Available on iOS, Android, and desktop, it guarantees entertaining challenges on the go.
games.howToPlayText:
In this game you draw an obstacle for a ball instead of controlling a boring board.

Also plenty of interesting upgrades are waiting for you. 

Draw with left mouse button or your finger.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/arkanoid-for-painters-08c5-1?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Village of Colors
games.description: Dive into the lively realm of Village of Colors, where your imagination is key. In this free online game, defend the village by sketching protective barriers. With unique villagers and challenging foes, you can pause time and boost your skills to keep your vibrant home safe.
games.howToPlayText:
To protect your villagers from enemies, draw obstacles with your mouse or finger on the screen.

Buy abilities in the store on the main menu to make the game easier.

All features are described in the Hero's Help.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/village-of-colors?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Make the glass happy
games.description: Draw lines to guide the water and fill the glass! Use logic and creativity to solve each level and make the glass happy.
games.howToPlayText:
Press the left mouse button to draw a shape on the computer.

On mobile devices, draw by tapping on the screen.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/make-the-glass-happy?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Save the Noob
games.description: Save the Noob is an engaging puzzle game that invites players to creatively rescue Noob from threats using a magical line. Accessible online for free across devices, it boasts numerous challenging levels that offer fun and strategic gameplay, perfect for passing the time.
games.howToPlayText:
Draw a line in the selected area of the screen, without intersections and without going beyond the boundaries of the area.
After you finish drawing the line, it will fall.
When falling, you need to destroy all the enemies and not touch the Noob.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/save-noob-playgama?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Brain Coloring Puzzle
games.description:
Discover Italian Brainrot Meme Coloring Puzzle Game
Step into the viral world of Italian Brainrot Meme Characters, where over thirty absurd creatures await your palette. No numbers, no hints—only your eye for color and a playful spirit.
Meet the Stars
Bombardiro Crocodilo: Our most fiendish color‑match boss.
Tung Tung Tung Tung Sahur: A viral sensation inspired by Italian Brainrot.
Shimpanzinni Bananinni, Boneca Ambalabu, Tralalero Tralala and many more bring humor and challenge.
Why You’ll Love It
Brain‑Boosting Fun: Sharpens visual memory and logic.
Creative Freedom: No right answer—trust your instincts.
Offline Play: Dive in anytime, anywhere.
Designed for Ages 12+: Simple enough for kids, intriguing for teens and adults.
Ready to color outside the lines? Tap Install and unleash your inner artist on the most delightfully absurd paint‑puzzle around!
games.howToPlayText:
How to Play
Select Your Palette: Pick from 4–5 vibrant hues.
Tap to Color: Assign each color to outfit, shoes, hair and more—without numeric guidance.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/brain-coloring-puzzle?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: DOP2: Draw Love
games.description: Help a funny couple escape tricky situations in this hilarious puzzle game! Solve levels by drawing missing parts and uncover secrets. Can you keep love alive? Play now for laughs and brain-teasing fun!
games.howToPlayText:
Who is he flirting with? What is he hiding?
Funny couple, got into a funny situation again! You need to help the guy get out of trouble and not lose his beloved. Each level is a fun puzzle game where you need to finish the missing part to help the lovers. Look at the picture, draw the missing element! When you successfully complete the task and draw the detail, you will see how the couple will react!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/dop2-draw-love-8ee9-1?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Draw & Drop
games.description: Dive into the thrilling universe of Draw & Drop, where creativity and skill collide! Navigate the ball into a basket by sketching your route, while overcoming tricky obstacles. Test your ingenuity through various levels, available for free on both mobile and desktop. Enjoy the challenge!
games.howToPlayText:
-Draw a line where you can direct the ball to the goal

-Click on the ball or the "start" icon in the Top Right to start

-The ball will move along the line you drew.

-The level passes when the ball hits the Target.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/draw--drop?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Brain Draw Line
games.description:
Put your mind to the test with Brain Draw Line: Link Dots, a simple yet captivating puzzle game that challenges creativity and logic. Draw one continuous line without lifting your finger or going backward to connect the dots and finish complicated designs.

The goal of this game is simple: create a single, continuous line without lifting your finger or overlapping any lines to link all the dots in a specific shape. With each level, the puzzles get more complex.
games.howToPlayText:
Draw in One Go: Use a single continuous line to complete the given shape.
Avoid Overlaps: Plan your path carefully and don’t retrace any steps.
Complete Shapes: Solve each shape to unlock the next, more challenging level.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/brain-draw-line?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Happy Glass - Draw to Fill
games.description: Happy Glass: Draw to Fill is a creative and relaxing puzzle game where your goal is to fill a happy glass with water — but there's a twist! You must draw lines and shapes to guide the water flow into the glass. Think strategically, draw creatively, and use physics to your advantage as you solve increasingly challenging levels. The game features colorful visuals, satisfying animations, and a joyful glass that smiles only when full. Whether you're a fan of brain teasers or just love doodling your way through clever puzzles, this game is sure to entertain and test your ingenuity.
games.howToPlayText: Use your finger or mouse to draw lines or shapes on the screen. These drawings will act as paths, ramps, or barriers to guide the water into the glass. The goal is to fill the glass above the dashed line without spilling too much water. Think carefully and use your imagination to solve each level — and don’t forget, the glass only smiles when it’s full!
